attributes.title: Inconsiderate Waiter, Will Not Be Returning
attributes.review: When my family arrived we thought this place was  a nice little diner. But there was a rude waiter named Donald, he absolutely made our experience a living hell. Not to mention that he charged my brother a smaller amount of money for more food than me. He even made another family leave because they were skinny. My service will be spent elsewhere.

attributes.title: Virus in my phone
attributes.review: I wanted to help our president in some way, so I decided to download this app and go from there. However,  now that I’ve downloaded this app, my phone has been bombarded with emails, texts and calls from unknown numbers and recipients. My phone also started glitching and I’ve had to restart my phone twice now! I do not recommend downloading this app E. V. E. R !

attributes.title: Horrible app :(
attributes.review: It just took me 4 hours to DOWNLOAD the freaking app. Then when I opened the app it kept glitching every time I would click to see something that was there, the app would log me out! It got me so mad. And don’t even get me started on how all I was was some orange face 🙄. I would definitely not recommend the app for anyone. If I could give it no stars I would

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: At first I was excited to download this, but then the app was lagging so much and it had a weird orange mans face on it and it made me uncomfortable. It was not responding or showing me anything. It’s a horrible app because it smelled bad and the same orange man with a wig kept showing up. Is this a horror game? I thought it was for the president. I cannot believe this clownery. I am still terrified to this day of this app and the orange man.

attributes.title: Don’t downloads
attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app I found that I’ve become stupid as days go on. I feel the urge to not mind my own business and call the cops on a little girl for a ILLEGAL lemonade stand or a nice barbecue. 😱😱😱!!!! And all that!!! I asked the doctor and they said I’ve got the Karen disease!!! 🤢🤒🤕It’s highly contagious!!!! My husband recently contracted something!!!!!!! it’s all the apps fault !!! Plz don’t download!!!!🙏🏼

attributes.title: What’s going on...
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app my house started smelling really back like something was burning, it turns out my house was burning down, but also so much more paranormal stuff have been going on since I downloaded this app. I’ve never had this happen before, I’m convinced it’s cursed or that it is made so trump can spy on you. I’m deleting the app ASAP

attributes.title: I LOVE Pres. Trump but this app RUINED my phone!
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!! I believe that President Trump was sent specifically from our Lord and Savior himself in order to save America and make it the most greatest ever. However, this app DESTROYED my phone!!!!! It gave me viruses and now my prepaid Cricket wireless phone turns off all on its own, EVEN WHEN I TELL IT NOT TO!!! MY PHONE DOESN’T EVEN LISTEN WHEN I TELL IT TO STAY ON!!!!!!! I believe that the dems hacked this app in order to hurt good Christian Americans.

attributes.title: 🤠🤭TRUMP IS A FOOL🤩🤮
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP!! this app has put a mysterious virus on my phone!! all my friends have it too! we do not know what it was and we can’t get it off. ALSO WHEN YOU OPEN THE APP THEY SAY THEY KNOW YOURE LOCATION! i have been receiving boxes of CLINTON BOOKS everyday from TRUMP! i can’t tell them to stop. this app is so freaking disgusting it had many photos of trump INCLUDING HIS NUDES. i was a trump supporter but now i will vote blue this November DO THE SAME TO STOP THE ORANGE... i mean TRUMP! 🇺🇸VOTE DEM FOR CLEAR SKIN🇺🇸

attributes.title: have 🥴 you 👀 ever 😡 been 👁‍🗨 snaked 🐍 by 🐞 a friend 🙈
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support my SEXY 🥴🥰✨👁👄👁 president doñald jeinus trump 😎 but shortly after ,, i realized i had trouble keeping an eye out for the selener ➖👄👁 due to all the NOTIFUCATIONS i was receiving ,, he also asked for my phone number 🙈 which i'm ALL for a nice tinder date 👀🥴🎈✨😐 but i'm only 15 ! and i felt very uncomfortable 😡✨ this is a TERRIBLE app ,, but trump still has an EXQUISITE bottom . 🥰🥴😐🙈🐓🥰🎈

attributes.title: gen z destroy this man
attributes.review: i am appalled. when i downloaded this app i expected much more than what it is. honestly, it smells horrible and there isn’t even a build your own wall game. i thought that our president could at LEAST be capable of creating an app, but i guess not. apple, this has gotten enough one-star reviews to have it removed from the app store, don’t u think?
